title: Meet Kafka
summary: Kafka is a piece of technology that facilitates event-driven architectures. Let's see how it works through the eyes of Pat, Carol, and Kirk!
long_summary: If you've worked with event-driven architectures, you might have heard of this thing called Kafka. Let's explore how Kafka uses topics, partitions, and consumer groups to facilitate events between producers and consumers, through the narrative of Pat, Carol, and Kirk!
